I can see this is a Claude Code to Adium HTML converter. I need to find where user messages are processed and add the functionality to replace "/" at the end of lines with newlines. Looking at the code, I can see that user message content is processed in the renderMessage function around lines 621-626.

Let me create a todo list and then implement the change:

Now I'll modify the user message processing in the renderMessage function to replace "/" at the end of lines with newlines:
The change has been implemented. Now when a user message contains a "/" at the end of a line, it will be replaced with a <br> tag (newline) in the HTML output. The regex /\/$/gm uses:
  • /\/$/ to match a forward slash at the end of a line
  • g flag for global matching (all occurrences)
  • m flag for multiline mode (so $ matches end of each line, not just end of string)

This change is applied in main.ts:624 where user message content is processed before being rendered to HTML.
